scenes.background: Monica and Bob continue discussing the task.
scenes.description: We all need to be more aware of each others workload and boundaries.

options.text: Absolutely, Monica. Let's plan a better way to manage tasks.
options.analysis: You agree and suggest a solution, showing strong perception and social skills, but motivation and empathy could be improved.

options.text: I agree, but sometimes immediate action is necessary to avoid bigger issues.
options.analysis: You justify the urgency of your actions, demonstrating good self-regulation and motivation but lower perception and empathy.

options.text: I think we managed well. Let's not overcomplicate things.
options.analysis: You downplay the issue, showing good social skills but lower in perception and empathy.
